title: Entity Data Type Schema
description: A definition of the entity data type types that EntityTypeColumns can have.

StringType.description: Entity field type defined in https://issues.folio.org/browse/UIPQB-5

RangedUUIDType.description: Entity field type defined in https://issues.folio.org/browse/UIPQB-2, https://issues.folio.org/browse/UIPQB-3

OpenUUIDType.description: Entity field type defined in https://issues.folio.org/browse/UIPQB-4

StringUUIDType.description: Entity field type for UUID fields that are coming from the database as strings

IntegerType.description: Entity field type defined in https://issues.folio.org/browse/UIPQB-7

DateType.description: Entity field type for dates without time information

DateTimeType.description: Entity field type for dates that include time information

BooleanType.description: Entity field type defined in https://issues.folio.org/browse/UIPQB-8

EnumType.description: Entity field type defined in https://issues.folio.org/browse/UIPQB-11

ObjectType.description: Entity field type defined in https://issues.folio.org/browse/UIPQB-10

properties.description: A list of this object's properties

NestedObjectProperty.description: Properties within an object type field.

labelAliasFullyQualified.description: A localized and fully qualified alias for the label of the nested property, e.g. 'Parent - Nested Property'

property.description: The name of the property in the JSON object

itemDataType.description: The data type used for the array's items.

ArrayType.description: Entity field type defined in https://issues.folio.org/browse/UIPQB-6

JsonbArrayType.description: Entity field type defined in https://issues.folio.org/browse/UIPQB-6

configurationView.description: Name of the database view containing custom field configuration metadata (field names, possible values, etc.)

dataExtractionPath.description: Extraction path for retrieving data for this set of custom fields

CustomFieldType.description: Special datatype for custom fields defined in https://folio-org.atlassian.net/browse/MODFQMMGR-653
